treatment-md.title: Phasmotaenia bukaense Hennemann & Conle, 2009, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: Studies on the genus Phasmotaenia Navás, 1907, with the descriptions of five new species from the Solomon Islands, a revised key to the species and notes on its geographic distribution (Phasmatodea: “ Anareolatae ”: Phasmatidae s. l.: Stephanacridini)
